nodeList.nodeDescription: A melee attack that release a wave of flames from your weapon cleaving through enemies in a cone infront of you. Deals 8 additional fire damage. Deals up to 50% less damage to distant enemies.

nodeList.description: Flame Reave has increased attack speed and costs less mana, but travels more slowly, reducing its range.

nodeList.altText: {Spreading Flames} deals fire damage over time, and spreads to nearby enemies after half a second. Enemies cannot have multiple instances of spreading flames at once.

nodeList.description:
When you hit an enemy with Flame Reave you have a chance to cast {Fireball} towards the enemy hit.


Fireballs cast this way cannot have extra projectiles.

node.description: Every four uses Flame Reave has greatly increased width, range, and damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
Flame Reave has increased attack speed and costs less mana, but travels more slowly, reducing its range.

node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that release a wave of flames from your weapon cleaving through enemies in a cone infront of you. Deals 8 additional fire damage. Deals up to 50% less damage to distant enemies.

nodeList.altText: Flame Reave retains its base fire damage.
nodeList.description:
Fire damage bonuses from this tree are converted to Lightning. Consequently those damage bonuses will scale with increases to lightning damage.


All ignite chance from this tree is converted to shock chance and effects related to ignite now depend on shock instead.
